trans-unit.source: Abstract base class for a serializer that can serialize and deserialize key identifier clauses.
trans-unit.target: 可以序列化和反序列化密钥标识符子句的序列化程序的抽象基类。

trans-unit.source: Key identifier clauses are represented by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause> class and by classes derived from it.
trans-unit.target: 由表示密钥标识符子句<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause>类，并从它派生的类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClauseSerializer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClauseSerializer" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An XML reader positioned at the start element of the key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: 放置在密匙标识符子句的开始元素的位置的一个 XML 读取器。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns a value that indicates whether the element where the specified reader is positioned can be read as a key identifier clause by the handler.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，将返回一个值，该值指示定位指定读取器的元素是否可由处理程序读取为标识符子句。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the XML can be deserialized to a key identifier clause by the handler; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过处理程序序列化 XML 密钥标识符子句，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the XML can be read as a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause> of the <xref:System.Type> processed by the derived handler.
trans-unit.target: 检查是否可以作为读取 XML<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause>的<xref:System.Type>派生的处理程序处理。

trans-unit.source: The key identifier clause to check.
trans-unit.target: 要检查的密钥标识符子句。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns a value that indicates whether the specified key identifier clause can be serialized by the handler.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，将返回一个值，该值指示处理程序是否可对密钥标识符子句进行序列化。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the key identifier clause can be serialized by the handler, otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果密钥标识符子句可以由该处理器序列化，则为 <see langword="true" />否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An XML reader positioned at the start element of the key identifier clause to read.
trans-unit.target: 放置在密匙标识符子句的开始元素的位置，要读取的一个 XML 读取器。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, deserializes a key identifier clause from by using the specified XML reader.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写时，通过使用指定 XML 读取器对密钥标识符子句进行反序列化。

trans-unit.source: The key identifier clause that was deserialized from the XML.
trans-unit.target: 从 XML 反序列化的密钥标识符子句。

trans-unit.source: The XML Writer to use to serialized the key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: 用于序列化密钥标识符子句的 XML 编写器。

trans-unit.source: The key identifier clause to serialize.
trans-unit.target: 要序列化的密钥标识符子句 。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, serializes the specified key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写时，将密钥标识符子句序列化。
